page.title: 19Old Sealand Remembered.
page.content: An old gentleman came to our school to tell us what Sealand was like when he was a boy of 10. He is now 72. He told us that many of the houses like the Broseley Estate and Riverside Park council estate had not been built.There were really only 2 main streets, Sealand Avenue and Farm Road. All the other council houses and Garden City were built much later. There was no by-pass and Welsh Road was the main road, but that had only a few cars but quite a few horses and carts. The gentleman's name was Mr. Garner.
